title: Exclusive: Beavercreek senior community acquired
content:
A senior living complex in Beavercreek has been acquired.

United Church Homes, a Marion-based senior living services provider, has acquired Fairwood Village, a 61-unit senior housing apartment community in Beavercreek. Terms of the deal are not being disclosed. As part of the deal, Fairwood Village is changing its name to Trinity Community at Fairwood, United Church Homes tells me.
